20 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_SIZE_ARRAY_H__INCLUDED
21 #define TILEDARRAY_SIZE_ARRAY_H__INCLUDED
22 
23 #include <TiledArray/math/outer.h>
24 #include <TiledArray/math/partial_reduce.h>
25 #include <TiledArray/permutation.h>
26 #include <cstddef>
27 
28 namespace TiledArray {
29 namespace detail {
30 
32 
38 template <typename T>
39 class SizeArray {
40  private:
41  T* first_ = nullptr;
42  T* last_ = nullptr;
43 
44  public:
45  // type definitions
46  typedef T value_type;
47  typedef T* iterator;
48  typedef const T* const_iterator;
49  typedef T& reference;
50  typedef const T& const_reference;
51  typedef T* pointer;
52  typedef const T* const_pointer;
53  typedef std::size_t size_type;
54  typedef std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
55 
56  // Compiler generated functions
57  SizeArray() = default;
58  SizeArray(const SizeArray&) = default;
59  SizeArray(SizeArray<T>&&) = default;
60  ~SizeArray() = default;
61 
62  SizeArray(pointer const first, pointer const last)
63  : first_(first), last_(last) {}
64 
65  SizeArray(pointer const first, const size_type n)
66  : first_(first), last_(first + n) {}
67 
68  void set(pointer const first, const size_type n) {
69  first_ = first;
70  last_ = first + n;
71  }
72 
73  void set(pointer const first, pointer const last) {
74  first_ = first;
75  last_ = last;
76  }
77 
78  SizeArray<T>& operator=(const SizeArray<T>& other) {
79  TA_ASSERT(size() == other.size());
80  math::copy_vector(last_ - first_, other.data(), first_);
81  return *this;
82  }
83 
84  template <typename U>
85  SizeArray<T>& operator=(const U& other) {
86  TA_ASSERT(size() == size(other));
87  std::copy(std::begin(other), std::end(other), first_);
88  return *this;
89  }
90 
91  template <typename U>
92  operator std::vector<U>() const {
93  return std::vector<U>(first_, last_);
94  }
95 
96  template <typename U, std::size_t N>
97  operator std::array<U, N>() const {
98  TA_ASSERT(N == size());
99  std::array<U, N> temp;
100  math::copy_vector(last_ - first_, first_, temp.begin());
101 
102  return temp;
103  }
104 
105  // iterator support
106  iterator begin() { return first_; }
107  const_iterator begin() const { return first_; }
108  iterator end() { return last_; }
109  const_iterator end() const { return last_; }
110 
111  // reverse iterator support
112  typedef std::reverse_iterator<iterator> reverse_iterator;
113  typedef std::reverse_iterator<const_iterator> const_reverse_iterator;
114 
115  reverse_iterator rbegin() { return reverse_iterator(end()); }
116  const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const {
117  return const_reverse_iterator(end());
118  }
119  reverse_iterator rend() { return reverse_iterator(begin()); }
120  const_reverse_iterator rend() const {
121  return const_reverse_iterator(begin());
122  }
123 
124  // operator[]
125  reference operator[](size_type i) { return first_[i]; }
126  const_reference operator[](size_type i) const { return first_[i]; }
127 
128  // at() with range check
129  reference at(size_type i) {
130  TA_ASSERT(i < size());
131  return first_[i];
132  }
133 
134  const_reference at(size_type i) const {
135  TA_ASSERT(i < size());
136  return first_[i];
137  }
138 
139  // front() and back()
140  reference front() {
141  TA_ASSERT(first_);
142  return first_[0];
143  }
144 
145  const_reference front() const {
146  TA_ASSERT(first_);
147  return first_[0];
148  }
149 
150  reference back() {
151  TA_ASSERT(first_);
152  return *(last_ - 1);
153  }
154 
155  const_reference back() const {
156  TA_ASSERT(first_);
157  return *(last_ - 1);
158  }
159 
160  // size is constant
161  size_type size() const { return last_ - first_; }
162  bool empty() const { return first_ == NULL; }
163  size_type max_size() const { return last_ - first_; }
164 
165  // swap (note: linear complexity in N, constant for given instantiation)
166  void swap(SizeArray<T>& other) {
167  std::swap_ranges(begin(), end(), other.begin());
168  }
169 
170  // direct access to data (read-only)
171  const_pointer data() const { return first_; }
172 
173  // use array as C array (direct read/write access to data)
174  pointer data() { return first_; }
175 
176  // assign one value to all elements
177  void assign(const_reference value) {
178  math::fill_vector(last_ - first_, value, first_);
179  }
180 
181  // Comparison operators
182  template <typename U>
183  bool operator==(const SizeArray<U>& other) const {
184  if (first_ == other.data()) return true;
185 
186  const std::size_t n = size();
187  if (n != other.size()) return false;
188 
189  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
190  if (first_[i] != other[i]) return false;
191 
192  return true;
193  }
194 
195  template <typename U>
196  bool operator!=(const SizeArray<U>& other) const {
197  if (first_ == other.data()) return false;
198 
199  const std::size_t n = size();
200  if (n != other.size()) return true;
201 
202  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
203  if (first_[i] == other[i]) return false;
204 
205  return true;
206  }
207 
208  // Vector operations
209 
211 
218  template <typename Arg, typename Op>
219  void binary(const Arg* const arg, const Op& op) {
220  math::vector_op(op, last_ - first_, first_, arg);
221  }
222 
224 
234  template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op>
235  void binary(const Left* const left, const Right* const right, const Op& op) {
236  math::vector_op(op, last_ - first_, first_, left, right);
237  }
238 
240 
245  template <typename Op>
246  void unary(const Op& op) {
247  math::vector_op(op, last_ - first_, first_);
248  }
249 
251 
259  template <typename Arg, typename Op>
260  void unary(const Arg* const arg, const Op& op) {
261  math::vector_op(op, last_ - first_, first_, arg);
262  }
263 
265 
276  template <typename Arg, typename Result, typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp>
277  Result reduce(const Arg* const arg, Result result, const ReduceOp& reduce_op,
278  const JoinOp& join_op) const {
279  math::reduce_op(reduce_op, join_op, last_ - first_, result, first_, arg);
280  return result;
281  }
282 
284 
294  template <typename Result, typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp>
295  Result reduce(Result result, const ReduceOp& reduce_op,
296  const JoinOp& join_op) const {
297  math::reduce_op(reduce_op, join_op, last_ - first_, result, first_);
298  return result;
299  }
300 
302 
312  template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op>
313  void row_reduce(const size_type n, const Left* const left, const Right* right,
314  const Op& op) {
315  math::row_reduce(last_ - first_, n, left, right, first_, op);
316  }
317 
319 
327  template <typename Arg, typename Op>
328  void row_reduce(const size_type n, const Arg* const arg, const Op& op) {
329  math::row_reduce(last_ - first_, n, arg, first_, op);
330  }
331 
333 
343  template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op>
344  void col_reduce(const size_type m, const Left* const left, const Right* right,
345  const Op& op) {
346  math::col_reduce(m, last_ - first_, left, right, first_, op);
347  }
348 
350 
358  template <typename Arg, typename Op>
359  void col_reduce(const size_type m, const Arg* const arg, const Op& op) {
360  math::col_reduce(m, last_ - first_, arg, first_, op);
361  }
362 
364 
375  template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op>
376  void outer(const size_type m, const size_type n, const Left* const left,
377  const Right* const right, const Op& op) {
378  TA_ASSERT((m * n) == size());
379  math::outer(m, n, left, right, first_, op);
380  }
381 
383 
394  template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op>
395  void outer_fill(const size_type m, const size_type n, const Left* const left,
396  const Right* const right, const Op& op) {
397  TA_ASSERT((m * n) == size());
398  math::outer_fill(m, n, left, right, first_, op);
399  }
400 
402 
415  template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Base, typename Op>
416  void outer_fill(const size_type m, const size_type n, const Left* const left,
417  const Right* const right, const Base* const base,
418  const Op& op) {
419  TA_ASSERT((m * n) == size());
420  math::outer_fill(m, n, left, right, base, first_, op);
421  }
422 
423 }; // class SizeArray
424 
425 template <typename T>
426 inline std::vector<T> operator*(const Permutation& perm,
427  const SizeArray<T>& orig) {
428  std::vector<T> result(orig.size());
429  permute_array(perm, orig, result);
430  return result;
431 }
432 
433 template <typename T>
434 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os,
435  const SizeArray<T>& size_array) {
436  print_array(os, size_array);
437  return os;
438 }
439 
440 } // namespace detail
441 } // namespace TiledArray
